text.autoconfig.autoelytrapanic.title: Auto Elytra Panic Configuration
text.autoconfig.autoelytrapanic.option.p: The minimum fall distance before checking for activation
text.autoconfig.autoelytrapanic.option.f: When active this will be the player's pitch while flying
text.autoconfig.autoelytrapanic.option.y: The amount of degrees to be added to your player's yaw to make you spin per each game tick (1 game tick is every 0.05 seconds)
text.autoconfig.autoelytrapanic.option.r: If you want to restore your previous viewing angle (yaw and pitch) when you landed / the mod got deactivated
text.autoconfig.autoelytrapanic.option.i: If this is enabled, the mod won't activate and show message in the chat because your elytra
text.autoconfig.autoelytrapanic.option.m: If you want the mod to send a message in the selected messages output mode when it activates
Where the messages coming from the mod should go, in the Chat or in the Action Bar (also know as the Status Bar)
message.autoelytrapanic.elytraDamaged: Auto Elytra Panic cannot activate, your elytra are too damaged.
